thread.title: Cameron backs Nadiya to take Great British Bake Off title
thread.title_full: Cameron backs Nadiya to take Great British Bake Off title (From Herald Scotland)

author: heraldscotland.com
title: Cameron backs Nadiya to take Great British Bake Off title
text:
David Cameron has revealed who he'll be rooting for in the final of the Great British Bake Off: Nadiya Jamir Hussain.
The Prime Minister said he was backing the Muslim mother for showing she was "so cool under pressure" in reaching the last three of the popular TV contest.
He plans to sit down with his family to watch her showdown with rivals Tamal Ray and Ian Cumming on Wednesday, just hours after making his keynote speech to the Conservative Party conference.
Share article
The PM's own bread-making skills might not be appreciated by judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood - two years ago he revealed he likes to bake it in a machine.
